Uses of Class
org.pepstock.charba.client.colors.GradientOrientation

  • Packages that use GradientOrientation 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client.colors
    Contains the enumerations of HTML and GWT Material colors, to consume out-of-the-box, and utilities to create and manage own colors and classes to define gradients of patterns for charts.

    • Uses of GradientOrientation in org.pepstock.charba.client.colors

      Returns the gradient orientation.

      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
